title.value: Transforms a DK-HL7 Personal Health Monitoring Report (PHMR) XML document to FHIR Observation (ehealth-observation profile) resource. The input FHIR DocumentReference contains the PHMR XML document adhering to the DK-HL7 Personal Health Monitoring Report profile The returned FHIR Bundle contains a FHIR Composition (ehealth-composition profile) resource referencing.one or more FHIR Observation (ehealth-observation profile) resources and referenced resources such as FHIR Organization.

description.value: Transforms a DK-HL7 Personal Health Monitoring Report (PHMR) XML document to FHIR Observation (ehealth-observation profile) resource. The input FHIR DocumentReference contains the PHMR XML document adhering to the DK-HL7 Personal Health Monitoring Report profile The returned FHIR Bundle contains a FHIR Composition (ehealth-composition profile) resource referencing.one or more FHIR Observation (ehealth-observation profile) resources and referenced resources such as FHIR Organization.
